code: devtools::install_github('shalom-lab/pcolor') library(pcolor) ################################### # Usage 1. Run as Function  pcolor() pcolor(5)  ################################### # Usage 2. Run as RStudio Addin  col<-c("#BF6861","#1C4659","#635C3A")  ################################### # Usage 3. RStudio Addin with Shortcuts   # e.g. Alt+Shift+P
